articles.title: Natural Resources on Mars Could Produce Rocket Fuel, Say Researchers - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Cyanobacteria and E. coli could be the key to Martian rocket fuel.
articles.content:
A new study has discovered that future astronauts who find themselves on Mars may be able to use its natural resources to help make rocket fuel that could assist in getting them back to Earth.
